summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SmartStore 3-step onboarding wizard. All 4 onboarding pages tested successfully with full functionality validation.
passed_tests: Step 1 Store Details page loads with correct title and progress indicator
Store name input field accepts and retains user input
Country dropdown displays 7 countries with flag emojis
Currency and timezone auto-update when country selection changes
Currency and timezone fields are manually editable
Primary marketplace dropdown shows 7 marketplace options
Optional section toggle expands to reveal business type and tax ID fields
Business type radio buttons (Individual/Company) function correctly
Tax ID input field accepts user input
Continue button navigates to connect-marketplace page
Step 2 Connect Marketplace page loads with correct title and progress
5 marketplace cards displayed (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, Wish, More coming soon)
'More coming soon' card is properly disabled
Marketplace card clicks open connection panel with all required fields
Connection panel includes API key, Seller ID, Region inputs
Test connection and Connect buttons are functional
Security note and help link are visible in connection panel
Close button dismisses connection panel
Back and Continue navigation buttons work correctly
Step 3 Review page displays all summary information correctly
Store Details summary shows mock data (My Electronics Store, India, INR, etc.)
Connected Marketplaces summary shows Amazon and Flipkart with count badge
Sync Scope displays Products, Inventory, Orders with checkmarks
Info banner about background sync is visible
Edit buttons link back to appropriate onboarding steps
Start Sync button navigates to syncing page
Syncing page shows initial title 'Setting things up for you'
4 progress steps animate sequentially over ~6 seconds
All steps show 'Done' status after completion
Title changes to 'You're all set!' after syncing completes
Skeleton loaders are visible during syncing phase
'Go to Dashboard' button appears and navigates to dashboard successfully
